App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.106.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0

mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.106.14

'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.179  no       Last written value=22144

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.106.10         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.106.11         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.106.13         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0

mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.106.9          Last written value=22144
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f8d534d5e70>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f8d534d5e70> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f8d537644f0>.model
